description:
Taiin (literally "Group Members") is a swarm of 1500 http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawks] forming one huge monster.
This swarm is controlled by one particular Lucifer Hawk whom Ma-ken Medium addresses as Bratieze.
(Dialog lines only in episode 24, thus only credited there in the ED section.)
This super-being directly attacks the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP]`s headquarter, merging with the building`s walls.
name: Taiin
